titleInfo.title: WPA workers at Standing Stone State Park

mods.abstract: Group of men, all wearing overalls, in front of the 12-foot rock that gave the state park its name. At front row, right, a man holds a puppy. Photograph is a laser copy in sepia.
mods.accessCondition: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law.
